rawPortfolioParameters


Valid input parameters for the PACTA workflow. Less than full parameters, since PACTA handles inheritence.

  • Option 1
  • portfolioParameters.json
Type: object

The following properties are required:

  • inherit

Analysis parameters.

Type: array of enum (of string)

List of equity markets to be analyzed.

 No Additional Items

Each item of this array must be:

Type: enum (of string)

Must be one of:

  • "DevelopedMarket"
  • "EmergingMarket"
  • "GlobalMarket"

Type: array of enum (of string)

List of scenario geographies to be analyzed.

 No Additional Items

Each item of this array must be:

Type: enum (of string)

Must be one of:

  • "Global"
  • "GlobalAggregate"
  • "NonOECD"
  • "OECD"

Type: array of enum (of string)

List of scenario sources to be used.

 No Additional Items

Each item of this array must be:

Type: enum (of string)

Must be one of:

  • "GECO2022"
  • "GECO2023"
  • "ISF2021"
  • "ISF2023"
  • "WEO2022"
  • "WEO2023"

Type: array of enum (of string)

List of PACTA sectors to be analyzed.

 No Additional Items

Each item of this array must be:

Type: enum (of string)

Must be one of:

  • "Automotive"
  • "Aviation"
  • "Cement"
  • "Coal"
  • "Oil&Gas"
  • "Power"
  • "Steel"

Type: integer

Start year of the analysis.

Value must be greater or equal to 2022

Type: integer

Time horizon of the analysis.

Value must be greater or equal to 1

Additional Properties of any type are allowed.

Type: object

Type: object

Definition for PACTA portfolio object

 No Additional Properties

Type: string

List of portfolio files to be analyzed.

Type: enum (of string)Format: date

Date of the holdings data.

Must be one of:

  • "2022-12-31"
  • "2023-12-31"

Type: string

Name of the portfolio.

Type: enum (of string)

Path to a file with inheritance information.

Must be one of:

  • "2022Q4"
  • "2023Q4"
  • "GENERAL_2022Q4"
  • "GENERAL_2023Q4"
  • "default"

Additional Properties of any type are allowed.
